name: Demon Will
description: $(item)Demon Will$() is one of the first things you can create with $(blood)Neo Vitae$(). Once you have gathered some with a $(l:neovitae:demon_will/will_manipulation/soul_snare)Soul Snare$(), you will be able to craft a $(l:neovitae:demon_will/will_manipulation/soul_gem)Petty Tartaric Gem$() and a $(l:neovitae:demon_will/demonic_items/sentient_sword)Sentient Sword$(/l)$().
